title: Peloton Bikes in the Fitness Center, Private Balconies & Juliettes
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 27', 'OR Text', '27', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1268 Sq.', 'Ft.', "One Observatory Park is nestled in the heart of one of South Denver's most sought-after neighborhoods, offering enhanced studio, one- and two-bedroom apartment homes.", 'The building features an impressive eleven stories of luxe living opportunities and an array of amenities to complement the first-class lifestyle found within.', 'Features:', 'Pendant Lighting & Modern Fixtures, Maple Wood Flooring in Kitchen & Living Areas, Granite Countertops, Large Walk-in & Walk-Through Closets, 10- to 11-Foot Ceilings, Private Balconies & Juliettes, Berber Carpet in Bedrooms, Panoramic Views of Rocky Mountains & Downtown, Electronic Key Systems, Built-in Desks with Granite Tops, Energy Star Stainless Steel Appliances, Energy Efficient Washers & Dryers, Ceiling Fans in Bedrooms, Kitchen Islands, Storage Spaces Available on Every Floor', '*In select units', '**Amenities may vary and are subject to change at any time', 'Community Amenities:', 'Spa, Rooftop Deck, Located Next to the Historic University of Denver Campus, Peloton Bikes in the Fitness Center, Cyber Café & Lounge, Resort Style Pool, Ample Bicycle Storage, Separate Retail & Residential Parking, 24-Hour Health & Fitness Hub, Self-Guided Tours Available, Clubroom & Lounge with Fireplace, Controlled Access/Gated, Complimentary Wi-Fi on Amenity Deck, Bike Repair Room, Elevators', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly.', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'n7Y1zaUK']
